items.content_html:

Hello, I'm deumiij. Welcome to my site :D

This site has been my project all this year. And i'm glad to announce that it's working as intended. There's still lots of things needed to be managed and (obviously) things to be added. Still can't decided what I'm gonna post or anything else, but hopefully I'll keep it in mind.
